about_the_game:
🌌 An Epic Interstellar Journey: Dive headfirst into a richly detailed, psychedelic universe filled with strange planets, alternate dimensions, and cosmic anomalies.

🚀 Unconventional Storytelling: "The Cosmic Tramp" defies conventional narrative structures, taking inspiration from the surreal and thought-provoking worlds of your favorite animated shows. Expect mind-bending twists, existential dilemmas, and unexpected philosophical encounters.

👾 Puzzles and Challenges: Solve intricate puzzles, engage in bizarre dialogues, and make critical decisions that will shape Cosmo's journey through the cosmos. Your choices will have far-reaching consequences in this ever-evolving adventure.

🪄 Surreal Art and Sound Design: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning and sonically captivating universe that will challenge your perception of reality.

👽 Eccentric Characters: Encounter a cast of peculiar and memorable characters, each with their own quirks and deep philosophical musings. Engage in thought-provoking conversations that will challenge your understanding of the universe.

🌟 Episodic Adventure: "The Cosmic Tramp" is an episodic game, with each chapter offering a new dimension of the story, unique challenges, and mind-expanding revelations.

🪐 Cosmic Exploration: Journey to the farthest reaches of the galaxy, uncovering secrets and unraveling the mysteries of existence along the way.

name: The Cosmic Tramp

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a cosmic journey as Moby, a curious wanderer. Traverse surreal realms, meet eccentric characters, and uncover the universe's enigmatic wonders. Each encounter offers unique stories and perspectives, expanding your understanding of existence.
